description: This file defines an interface for authentication services within the NotesBackend project, specifying methods for validating and creating users.

classes.name: IAuthService
classes.description: An interface that abstracts authentication functionalities, including user validation and creation.

methods.name: ValidateUser
methods.description: Validates the provided username and password, returning a User object if successful or null otherwise.

methods.name: CreateUser
methods.description: Creates a new user with the specified username and password, returning the created User object.
